item.description: In mindfulness meditation, we’re learning how to pay attention to the breath as it goes in and out, and notice when the mind wanders from this task. The idea behind mindfulness seems simple—the practice takes patience.

item.title: Poetry
item.description: Poetry is a broad literary category that covers everything from bawdy limericks to unforgettable song lyrics to the sentimental couplets inside greeting cards. A poem is a singular piece of poetry. Show, don’t tell. The goal is to provoke an emotion in the reader. Less can be more. While it’s perfectly acceptable to write long, flowery verse, using simple, concise language is also powerful. Word choice and poem length are up to you.
